item.title: Lin's 2011 Harrod's bear
item.description: 09:22 Friday 29 January 2016 CST I didn’t plan super well, but considered having the bear appear while we went bowling, or as if it had appeared from the sky while skydiving. On second thought, a skydiving bear would take away from the skydive itself, so I’m glad we didn’t do that. Anyway, I unceremoniously opened the box this morning, and the bear is currently under the covers on Lin’s side of the bed in Ma’s apartment.

item.title: Lin's Bear
item.description: 20:51 Thursday 03 December 2015 JST Lin is like, “am I going to get my bear or not?” Of course she is, but I keep telling her no so it will be a surprise when she gets it. Sigh. This happens every year, and I don’t know if she knows she’ll get it and is just harrassing me, or if she really doesn’t know. Hmmm!

item.title: Harrod's bear for Lin
item.description: ##16:15 Wednesday 24 December 2014 JST## I got Lin the 2014 Harrod’s bear, “Jasper” (I think). I’ve essentially promised her one each year, but each year I try to convince her that she doesn’t need another so she won’t expect it when she receives it.

item.title: so are you gonna get me the gift for Christmas or not?
item.description:
##23:12 Thursday 22 November 2012 Lin asked me tonight if I planned to buy the gift she wanted for Christmas.
Don’t tell Lin, but I ordered it two days ago. I didn’t tell her tonight because that’s not much of a Christmas surprise if I tell her now! It was a bit difficult not to tell her, but I was able to convince her that I planned not to buy it with responses like, “what are ya gonna do with it anyway, but just put it on the shelf?
